Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits certain deceptive pricing methods
Summary: Prohibits deceptive pricing methods that fail to provide information on mandatory fees for the sale or lease of any good or service.
LawCode: Add ยง349-h, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting certain deceptive pricing methods
